org.kepler.hadoop.io.input

Class FileContentInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat<K,V>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileInputFormat<java.lang.String,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
        • org.kepler.hadoop.io.input.FileContentInputFormat

  • public class FileContentInputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileInputFormat<java.lang.String,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
    This class provides InputFormat to read files. Key is file name (no path info), value is file content.
    Author:
    Jianwu Wang (jianwu@sdsc.edu)
